recommendations: Atul Harsha “Esha is a dedicated professional who consistently delivered high-quality content during her time at Info Edge (Shiksha Online). She has a strong understanding of user needs and business goals, which allowed her to excel in both technical content development and working on the product pages. Esha has explored wide range of analytics tools, including Google Analytics, SEMrush, Ahrefs and many others which she used to analyze data, optimize content strategies, and improve user experiences. Her creativity, attention to detail, and proactive collaboration made her an invaluable team member. I’m confident that Esha will excel in any role she takes on.”

Usha Rengaraju “Esha worked as a volunteer and core team member in GDG Mysuru, TFUG Mysuru, WiMLDS Mysuru, NeurIPS India meetup and WiDS Mysuru. She has great leadership skills and played a pivotal role in building these communities from the scratch .She has the right kind of soft skills to complement the technical acumen she possesses and particularly her time management skills are top notch. Wishing her the best and I would highly recommend her for any company she wishes to join .”
